titleStmt.title: Reasons for continuing the duty of eight pence upon each one hundred and twenty pounds weight of rock-salt, without allowing a draw-back upon refining the same; by comparing the brine-salt made at Northwitche in Cheshire, with the salt-rock refined at the dungeon near Leverpoole in Lancashire.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Columbia University Library.
